name: part_008
file: tmp_【#大空スバル6周年LIVE】大空スバル 6th 記念LIVE 星灯【ホロライブ⧸大空スバル】 [KJGX0gJhvrM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Oozora Subaru performs the song '瞬間センチメンタル' (Shunkan Sentimental).
MC section where Subaru talks about the performance and announces happy news.
Introduction of Oozora Subaru 6th Anniversary goods with an illustration by Shigure Ui.

subtitles.original: 交わしたはずのない約束が
subtitles.english: A promise we never made

subtitles.original: 今日も僕らの未来を奪おうとする
subtitles.english: still tries to steal our future today.

subtitles.original: 欲しがっていたものを手にしても
subtitles.english: Even when I get what I wanted,

subtitles.original: 素直に上手く笑えないのはなぜだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder why I can't just smile naturally.

subtitles.original: 溢れる涙は弱さや後悔じゃない
subtitles.english: These overflowing tears aren't from weakness or regret.

subtitles.original: 痛みが生んだカケラで
subtitles.english: They're fragments born of pain.

subtitles.original: どんな瞬間だって運命だってひとつだけ確かな
subtitles.english: Whatever the moment or fate, there's only one thing

subtitles.original: ものがあると知った
subtitles.english: that I've learned is certain.

subtitles.original: 一りで考えちゃって今を迷うより
subtitles.english: Rather than worrying alone and getting lost in the now,

subtitles.original: 明日を迎えに行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'll go out to meet tomorrow.

subtitles.original: ずっと持ってたい心の地雷スイッチは切ってない
subtitles.english: I haven't turned off the heart's trigger I want to keep forever.

subtitles.original: 変わらない未来壊したい いつも僕を見てるありふれたメロディが
subtitles.english: I want to break the unchanging future. This mundane melody is always watching me...

subtitles.original: くだらないと人に笑われても
subtitles.english: Even if people laugh and call it worthless,

subtitles.original: キラキラなおさら輝くのはなぜだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder why it sparkles even brighter.

subtitles.original: 何が本当で嘘か理屈じゃなくて
subtitles.english: It's not about logic, what's true or false;

subtitles.original: 感じていたい心で
subtitles.english: I want to feel it with my heart.

subtitles.original: ずっと愛なんて幻想だって誤魔化したくないよ
subtitles.english: I don't want to keep pretending that love is just an illusion,

subtitles.original: 傷ついたとしていい
subtitles.english: even if it means getting hurt.

subtitles.original: 分かり合いたいと強く願うほど
subtitles.english: Because the more I strongly wish to understand,

subtitles.original: ぶつかることもあるから
subtitles.english: the more we might clash.

subtitles.original: 泣けるくらい青空交差点で
subtitles.english: At the intersection under the cry-inducing blue sky,

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out my hand.

subtitles.original: 10年後もこんなふうにいられるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if we can still be like this 10 years from now,

subtitles.original: 一緒に
subtitles.english: together.

subtitles.original: どんな瞬間だって運命だってひとつだけ確かな
subtitles.english: Whatever the moment or fate, there's only one thing

subtitles.original: ものがあると知った
subtitles.english: that I've learned is certain.

subtitles.original: 限界だって困難だって諦めたくないよ
subtitles.english: Even with limits or hardships, I don't want to give up,

subtitles.original: このまま離さないで
subtitles.english: so don't let go of me now.

subtitles.original: 固く握りしめた君の右手は
subtitles.english: Your right hand, which I gripped tightly,

subtitles.original: ぬくもりここにあるから
subtitles.english: has a warmth that is right here.

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで！
subtitles.english: Yes! And with that!

subtitles.original: 4曲連続で聴いていただきました！
subtitles.english: You've just heard four songs in a row!

subtitles.original: どうだったでしょうか！？
subtitles.english: How did you like it!?

subtitles.original: わあああ！
subtitles.english: Waaaa!

subtitles.original: はい、結構ね、スバルのね、好きな曲とか
subtitles.english: Yes, it was quite a section with Subaru's favorite songs

subtitles.original: やりたいことをですね、こうギュッと詰め込んだパートになっています！
subtitles.english: and things she wanted to do packed tightly together!

subtitles.original: えー、ここからですね、いよいよ、ライブも終盤戦ということで！
subtitles.english: Er, from here, the live is finally reaching its final stage!

subtitles.original: えー、ここからはなんとちょっとみんなに告知があります！
subtitles.english: Er, and from here, I actually have an announcement for everyone!

subtitles.original: 嬉しいお知らせです！
subtitles.english: It's some happy news!

subtitles.original: なんと！大空スバル6周年記念ライブのグッズ告知だ！
subtitles.english: What! It's the goods announcement for Oozora Subaru's 6th Anniversary Live!

subtitles.original: それではこちらをどうぞ！
subtitles.english: Please take a look at this!

subtitles.original: きたー！ということで今回も盛りだくさんのグッズ紹介いってみたいと思います！
subtitles.english: It's here! So I'd like to introduce the abundance of goods this time as well!

subtitles.original: 今回のイラストは、しぐれうい母ちゃんに書いていただきました！
subtitles.english: This time's illustration was drawn by Shigure Ui-kaachan!

subtitles.original: 母ちゃん、いつもありがとう！
subtitles.english: Kaachan, thank you as always!

subtitles.original: 今回のグッズはマネージャー応援がコンセプトとなっています！
subtitles.english: The concept for these goods is 'Supporting the Manager'!

subtitles.original: さっそく見ていきましょう！まずは、こちら！
subtitles.english: Let's take a look right away! First, this!

subtitles.original: スバルがおうえん！！BIGアクリルスタンド！
subtitles.english: 'Subaru Supports You!!' BIG Acrylic Stand!

subtitles.original: スバルがみんなを応援している
subtitles.english: Subaru is supporting everyone...
